name: Mole Hole (kapaqw)
description:
After getting caught snooping around the Mole's Property, you get thrown into a Mole Hole, where you're left to rot. Luckily, a voice from above shows you the way; but does this voice have ulterior  motives ...?

esc = close game

F4 = toggle fullscreen

R = reset room (will add to death count)

Games About 10 Minutes long.

This game is something I made for the 1 Credit Game Jam, in which the theme was Dig! Dig! Dig! Sadly, I missed the deadline for it due to oversleeping, but I decided to post it here anyway. It may not be much but I put a decent amount of work into this.  Enjoy!
